snippet: Maxima’s attitude is a reminder of Generation 3, the one first marketed as a four-door sports car. The new model is now a bit longer and lower.
abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Nissan Maxima.
lead_paragraph: Maxima’s attitude is a reminder of Generation 3, the one first marketed as a four-door sports car. The new model is now a bit longer and lower.

headline.print_headline: New Maxima Gives Nissan Fans a Reason to Trade Up
headline.main: Video Review: New Maxima Gives Nissan Fans a Reason to Trade Up
